00011 using std::tr1::shared_ptr;
00012 using std::tr1::unordered_map;
00013 using std::tr1::enable_shared_from_this;
00014 
00015 namespace TenUI{
00016         
00017         class StyleSet;
00018         
00019         class StyleSetDeclaration : public enable_shared_from_this<StyleSetDeclaration> {
00020         public:
00021                 StyleSetDeclaration(const string& _name)
00022                         :name(_name){}
00023                 virtual ~StyleSetDeclaration(){}
00024 
00025                 void addStyleDeclaration(const shared_ptr<StyleDeclaration>& decls){
00026                         set[decls->getName()] = decls;
00027                 }
00028                 void setStyleDeclaration(const shared_ptr<StyleDeclaration>& decls){
00029                         set[decls->getName()] = decls;
00030                 }
00031                 void removeStyleDeclaration(const string& name){
00032                         set.erase(name);
00033                 }
00034                 shared_ptr<StyleSetDeclaration> clone(){
00035                         shared_ptr<StyleSetDeclaration> newSSDecl(new StyleSetDeclaration(name));
00036                         for( unordered_map<string, shared_ptr<StyleDeclaration> >::iterator it = set.begin();
00037                                  it != set.end();
00038                                  ++it){
00039                                 newSSDecl->addStyleDeclaration(it->second);
00040                         }
00041                         return newSSDecl;
00042                 }
00043                 shared_ptr<StyleSet> createStyleSet();
00044                 
00045                 string getName(){
00046                         return name;
00047                 }
00048                 
00049         private:
00050                 unordered_map<string, shared_ptr<StyleDeclaration> > set;
00051                 string name;
00052         };
00053         
00054 }
